name: The BoxBoy
description:
The Box-Boy mixes 2D isometric style with some Tower Defence elements. Defend yourself against Box-Vilains.

Start with nothing. Gather resources and give it to the altar. It will protect you against Box-Villains.

Use Arrow keys or w,a,s,d to move. Use Space bar to pick/drop items.

This game was made in less than 48h for Ludum Dare 45.
